patterns: what's the name of this course?
How much are term tests worth?
I don't have anything to live for anymore
I'm going to end it all
It's too much all the time
I'm going to jump off a building
responses: DT01-It hurts me so much to hear that. Please know that I am here for you and that there are so many others here for you too.
DT01-Thank you for having the courage to share that with me, I know that must have been hard. I want to help you any way I can.
DT01-My heart feels for your struggles right now. Remember that you are loved and that so much help is available to you.
DT01-You are precious. You don't deserve to be hurt or for you to keep fighting this battle alone.

patterns: I don't understand anything in this course
I'm going to fail this course
Why is this course so hard?
All this course's material is so complicated!
I didn't understand anything from lecture
responses: DT02-Maybe try attending office hours with your questions!
DT02-Always feel free to email your professor with your concerns.
DT02-I know how you feel, university courses are hard!
DT02-Studying with others can sometimes be helpful. Try reaching out to others on this server.
DT02-Remember there's no shame in dropping courses or adding them as CR/NCR if they aren't good fits!
DT03-Please take note of the following resources at your disposal
